title: Pathetic
review: Turned it off in under 3 mins. Gauge ur eyes out with rusty spoons instead

title: Just Brilliant!
review: Very funny and great story. Very good acting, really enjoyed it, Hopefully there will be a sequel!

title: Laughed til I cried then laughed some more.
review:
The movie world needed this,Ireland needed this.And it didn't disappoint.
From start to finish I laughed,my sides are still sore.
We attended the premiere and had been anticipating this movie since the last episode of the hit tv series introduced the 3rd brother.....simply brilliant.
Irish cinema has been lacking movies like this with humour,heart,a lurcher,a camper van,crusty socks,Grano and none stop bad language,with an Irish cast who have done us proud.
Well done to all.
And here's to,and hoping for a sequel......great work folks.
